articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: The impossible task of following SA20: One-Day Cup's struggle for cricketing relevance
articles.description: A week after the hectic and electric fanfare of the SA20, the One-Day Cup, starting on Saturday across both divisions, brings a calm more befitting of church services than white-ball cricket.
articles.content: A week after the hectic and electric fanfare of the SA20, the One-Day Cup, starting on Saturday across both divisions, brings a calm more befitting of church services than white-ball cricket.

articles.author: Abid Hussain
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: Is this Pakistan sport’s moment to shine, finally?
articles.description: Pakistan is hosting a major international cricket tournament after nearly three decades. Is it ready for show time?
articles.content: Islamabad, Pakistan Almost three decades ago, on March 17, 1996, Sri Lankan captain Arjuna Ranatunga deftly and calmly guided Australian fast bowler Glenn McGraths delivery to third man as Lahores Ga… [+16352 chars]

articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
